posts.post_content:
Posted By: Mike Antista
Here are a few T202 HOF cards. All cards are SGC graded and priced individually.  Insured, USPS mail shipping is included in price of cards.  Payment can be made via money orders, personal checks, or Paypal.  Thanks for looking.  I can be contacted at mcantista@juno.com. Mike

Catching him napping (Bresnahan/Oakes)SGC 40$80.00
Close at the plate (Payne/Walsh)SGC 30$60.00
Collins Easily Safe (Murphy/Collins)SGC 50$145.00
Schaefer Steals Second (Griffith/McBride)SGC 40$63.00
Speaker Scores (Engle/Speaker)SGC 40$245.00 SOLD
